{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = Option GlobeSurfer III GSM/HSPA Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |fandom = <!-- infodepot.fandom page, included underscores --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = Supported |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Option |model = GlobeSurfer |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = III |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 01/14/2014 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Option_GlobeSurfer_III |wlclass = G54 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = 3G mobile router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = NCMOGS0312 |icid = 2734A-GS0312 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM5354;BCM5354KFBG, HK0819, P13, 869424, R2; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS |cpu1_type_rev = BMIPS3300 (R1) |cpu1spd = 240 <!-- doc? --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Samsung;K8P5516UZB-EI4E; |flash1size = 32 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 32 |ram1chip = Qimonda;HYB25DC256160CF; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = IEEE 802.3/3u |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:0C:E3 |oui = 00:0C:E3
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = CFE;;; |stockos = Linux;OpenRG;;
|exp_if_types = Mini PCIe (USB) |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = 1 |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 3 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = LCD display,analogue phone port, |addchip = 2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SE2528L;SiGe, 2528L, 8042M;1; |802dot11_protocols = bg
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = GlobeSurfer |defaultssid_regex = ^GlobeSurfer$ |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 01/29/2009 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B0061SQF2C |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = B00266Z9F2 |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Used PSU=== {{hasPowerSupply |brand = PHIHONG |model = PSA15R-050P |input_v=100-240 |input_a=0.5 |input_hz=50-60 |input_c=AC |input_conn=NEMA 1-15P |output_v=5 |output_a=3 |output_c=DC |output_conn=barrel |output_OD=5.5 |output_ID=2.1 }}
==Links of Interest== :[http://www.option.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/01/95_Z08.209_UG_GSIII_a4_V3_HR_NC.pdf User guide] {{SupportPage|http://www.option.com/product/globesurfer-iii-2/}} :[http://www.option.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/01/96_GlobeSurfer-III-Reference-Manual-20120305.pdf Technical reference manual]
*[http://www.globesurfer.co.uk/globesurfer/Globesurfer_3_Plus.html Globesurfer 3 Plus] Has an LCD display, can be powered via USB port. :The miniPCIe slot is data only for use with included GTM382 3G module. :The default SSID is per the sample label affixed to the EUT in the FCC docs.
[http://pastebin.com/6giaS71U OpenWRT Bootlog] :[http://forum.pcekspert.com/showpost.php?p=2450564&postcount=8 Unofficial OpenWRT build/flashing tutorial] :[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=33250 Additional OpenWRT informations and discussion]
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/option/option_globesurferiii |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/option/gs3 |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = |subtarget = |arch = |support_started_version = 12.09 |current_supported_version = 12.09 |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
